replies.author: chychy1
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 chychy1 于 2012-8-17 15:54 编辑 

应该是这样
[lightstone][lightstone][lightstone][lightstone]
[lightstone][blank][blank][lightstone]
[lightstone][blank][blank][lightstone]
[lightstone][water][water][lightstone]
[lightstone][lightstone][lightstone][lightstone]
在[water]上拿着水桶倒水。
其他萤石上倒水是不行的。
